titles.title: A resolution calling for the elimination of funding of Kurt Waldheim's retirement allowance from the United Nations.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 4/28/1987--Introduced. Calls upon the President to instruct the Permanent Representative of the United States to the United Nations to work to eliminate Kurt Waldheim's retirement allowance from the United Nations Regular Program Budget for the biennium 1988-1989, and from all subsequent budgets.
